name: Zubat
flavorText:
Forms colonies in
perpetually dark
places. Uses ultrasonic waves
to identify and
approach targets.

previous.name: Wigglytuff
previous.flavorText:
The body is soft
and rubbery. When
angered, it will suck in air and
inflate itself to
an enormous size.

next.name: Golbat
next.flavorText:
Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

pokemon.name: Crobat
pokemon.flavorText:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.
